data.text: I loved this property. We booked 7 nights. It‚Äôs tucked away up a lane with plenty of restaurants right on your doorstep. Room was spotless, bed was so comfy and the staff are unbelievably helpful. Couldn‚Äôt ask more and would defo recommend anyone staying here if visiting Izmir
data.title: Excellent Hotel. highly recommend

data.text:
I thought the hotel's decor was stunning.
Such a beautiful lounge, with a gorgeous Frida Kahlo Wall and tea and water for guests to help themselves to. The hotel's warmly lit appearance from the front is something special and memorable - and the staff were all really nice people. Metin and Murat were very kind and helpful to us and both spoke very good English :-) We came for 2 nights from England and are familiar with Izmir ; Alsancak is a lively urban area full of restaurants, cafes and is open till late at  night. If you want to feel the young buzz of Alsancak, I'd say come here. Our room was really cosy and clean, the shower worked well and we had a pretty balcony! √áok te≈üekk√ºr ederim!
data.title: A beautifully decorated hotel

data.text:
The Hotel is really nice and clean. 
Air conditioner, balcony, bathroom, beds and other facilities were just grate for such a hotel in this price range.
We enjoyed our stay there.
And the other good point for this hotel is the location.
It's located in the middle of the bars, restaurants and coffees. Just one step outside the building and you are in the middle of the heaven üòç
data.title: Good Location and clean rooms

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
You are happy to leave our hotel. As soon as possible we will be happy to share the same hotel quality. Your sincerely best regards.
viva la vita.
owner_response.author: Viva La Vita Butik Otel

data.text: We stayed here for 5 nights and enjoyed everything about this hotel: prime location, clean and nice room and most of all, staff. Specially we would like to highlight G√∂kmen and pass our gratitude for making our experience memorable. Thank you very much and hope to come back soonüôèüòä
data.title: Excellent location and great staff ‚ù§Ô∏è

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
First of all, we would like to thank you for your comment and evaluation, you have made us very happy.
We wish you to be our guest as viva la vita family as soon as possible.
best regards.
owner_response.author: Gokmen Cankaya

data.text:
Beautiful boutique hotel in the heart of izmir. Stayed here almost a month, couldn't ask for more. The location is perfect....a walk away from kordon and in the heartbeat of izmir.

Beautiful rooms, fantastic price, house cleaning, damla in particular was a pleasure to say the least...Great human as well as staff member, amongst the wonderful staff.
data.title: Fantastic all round
